title: What do sweet potatoes look like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sweet potatos are root vegetables that are Bulbous and have a Brown Rough Exterior with a bright orange Flesh on the inside. There are different varieties however. They can be White, Orange, Purple too! They are Really good for you as well plus they are naturally sweet.   It’s a great vegetable to add into your diet! hope this helped. :)
Normal sweetpotato has a dark pink skin. Yams are used homeopathecally for hormone therapy
